website_summaries.verdict: The Toshiba Satellite Click 2 L35W-B3204 detachable tablet sits between dinky budget tablets and pricey hybrid laptops in terms of price, performance, and even physical design, but the larger size and affordable price don't make it any less awkward.
pros: Its large size is comfortable for typing and productive use in laptop mode
Relatively affordable price for a hybrid tablet
cons: Unwieldy when using as a tablet

customer_reviews.title: Seriously, don't buy this laptop
customer_reviews.text: It's the most low quality and cheap laptop I have ever owned; from day one there were problems with the keyboard, and now the touch screen and charging port do not work so not only is half the functionality of the laptop not there, but I cannot even use it while it's charging because I have to use the charging port that can only be used while disconnected from the keyboard (there are 2 charging ports). I will never buy a Toshiba product ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Brown

customer_reviews.title: Works great for on the go work
customer_reviews.text: Works great for on the go work, only issue is that the hinge on the keyboard portion broke and it pops out all the time. I think the speakers are all-right, I don't notice any difference from the average. Works great for even playing minecraft.
customer_reviews.author: Malachi Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Laptops break easily. Good product, screws come out and the tablet dosent connect the same with the base.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Scheffler

customer_reviews.title: great laptop / tablet but the on screen keyboard only ...
customer_reviews.text: great laptop / tablet but the on screen keyboard only works half the time and can't cut and paste or copy and paste with the on screen keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: JPMACK

customer_reviews.title: Terrible purchase. We have returned the laptop
customer_reviews.text: Terrible purchase. We have returned the laptop. First touchscreen wasn't working, then speakers started cracking. I searched for solutions and I was told to download Windows 10, we did it and all of the sudden the laptop was not starting properly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very bad Laptop nothing is working not even the touchscreen, I want my money back.
customer_reviews.author: G. Rached

customer_reviews.title: good but not the right one for me
customer_reviews.text: Kinda slow at times and WIFI was not fast but that is on me as I have a AC Router and this computer doesn't have AC Wifi card.
customer_reviews.author: Easton straus

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product at all
customer_reviews.text: This toshiba stopped working after one week. Not a good product at all!
customer_reviews.author: sylvia

customer_reviews.title: not working right out of box!
customer_reviews.text: IT came out of the box with the touch screen not working at all. I'm on the phone with Toshiba support right now, and it seems that I can't get support to fix this issue without paying for it, because the complementary support has run out. Not a happy camper, especially if I have to pay to have this thing fixed without even being able to use it. Update: according to the serial number on the bottom of this computer, at least via Toshiba customer support, this isn't even a touchscreen computer! Though, I know it is one, I wonder if the serial number is even legitimate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NO TOUCH SCREEN (statements from the tech details of the model:  NO PEN OR TOUCH INPUT IS AVAILABLE FOR THIS MODEL!.Toshiba Sate
customer_reviews.text: This is crazy!!! I read reviews where people complained about NO TOUCH screen but I thought they just got a broken, defected laptop. OK, my TOUCH SCREEN IS NOT A TOUCH SCREEN AT ALL!!! In the technical detail of the model it was stated: NO PEN OR TOUCH INPUT IS AVAILABLE FOR THIS MODEL!. So beware! Although the model is named touch screen there is no guaranty.Why do you need tablet if there is NO touch screen option?!!! Have no idea how to fix it. cannot return since in another country. Got stuck!
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Good basic use computer
customer_reviews.text: Good basic use computer. Nice keyboard. However, touchscreen doesn't seem to work. User manuals, troubleshooting, and call-in tech support are of not help. When a computer like this is missing some of its basic functionality, the computer is only half as useful. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Morton

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: open from the box and tuoch screen didnt work !!
customer_reviews.author: meir mellul

customer_reviews.title: Good until it died
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for a couple weeks then the hard drive died. Amazon returned it with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: I hope windows 10 solves the bugs.
customer_reviews.text: Upon receiving this product the touchscreen did not work. It is still unresponsive. I want a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Quarles

customer_reviews.title: Sould have bought a better Kindle
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so my wife could play her games from her Kindle fire on it, they can't be downloaded to it and she is very dissappointed
customer_reviews.author: Steven Dale

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: This computer is super slow right out of the gate. touchscreen is all over the place. keyboard fell apart quickly. I would never buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Next to useless
customer_reviews.text: Possibly the worst laptop I've ever used, it can't even handle chrome properly. Got as a gift for college, but the processor can't even handle web research. I'm actually going to recycle this pc. Damn durable, though. I've never been even remotely careful with it, and it's worked just fine. The reason it's a two star for this review is because Windows 8, which comes stock, actually works beautifully with this pc. I guess if you’re after a mobile notepad, it’s okay. But it does basically nothing else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ive had this laptop nearly two years, the touch ...
customer_reviews.text: Ive had this laptop nearly two years, the touch screen is spotty, as well as the key pad. My next laptop will most likely be a lenovo.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Traina

customer_reviews.title: Nice laptop for price... after you uninstall the bloatware..
customer_reviews.text: Turned into a decent little laptop after I upgraded it to Windows 10 and uninstalled all the bloatware that Toshiba like to fill their computers with.
customer_reviews.author: Myles

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the most defective laptops I've ever ...
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the most defective laptops I've ever purchased. I had to return it twice after being on the phone with technical support more than 2 hrs. each time. The tech support hours are also very limited. The first time I had to wait until the next day to talk to tech support because they were closed. No more windows-based products for me! :(
customer_reviews.author: CrystalA

product_meta.title: Toshiba - Satellite Click 2 2-in-1 13.3" Touch-Screen Laptop - Intel Pentium - 4GB Memory - 500GB Hard Drive - Satin Gold, L35W-B3204
product_meta.description: This Toshiba L35W-B3204 laptop's 13.3" 10-point multitouch screen allows precise navigation. An Intel Pentium processor elevates multitasking capabilities, boosts productivity and enhances your entertainment and Internet browsing experiences.
feature_bullets: Intel Pentium N3530 Processor o (2M Cache, up to 2.58GHz)
13.3” diagonal widescreen TruBrite TFT display, removable design (HD), 10 point multi-touch support, In-Plane Switching Technology(IPS), 1366x768 native resolution, Native support for 720p content
Stereo speakers tuned by Skull Candy, DTS Sound audio processing, HD web camera, Dual microphones Intel Dual-Band Wireless-AC 3160, Bluetooth 4.0
Port interface: 1 USB 3.0 port with USB Sleep and Charge, Memory Card Reader, Micro HDMI, Microphone/Headphone combination port, USB 2.0 port

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.3 out of 5 stars45 ratings3.3 out of 5 stars
